external_games.name: Drunk Trucker Joe 3D Truck Driving Race

name: Drunk Trucker Joe 3D Truck Driving Race
summary:
Alcohol, Trucks, Fat Trucker and a highway are simply things that do not go well together except in racing game.
Meet Joe, he can drive just about any truck you throw at him. From huge cranes, cement truck, Farm tractors and the regular “small” sized road truck. He can drive but can he do that well?
